Package gears.sidescroller.world.core

Class CollisionBox

java.lang.Object
gears.sidescroller.world.core.CollisionBox
public class CollisionBox extends Object
A CollisionBox is used to share collision detection and reaction between rectangular things. Objects wishing to use a CollisionBox should implement the Collidable interface. Note that the implementing object needn't be an ObjectInWorld: ObjectInWorlds need only invoke the CollisionBox constructor parametrized with an ObjectInWorld, whereas other classes can call the 4 integer parametrized constructor.
